name: SCHEELS
description: SCHEELS in Sparks is a massive 295,000-square-foot sporting goods destination that goes far beyond traditional retail. The store features two 16,000-gallon aquariums (one freshwater, one saltwater), a 65-foot Ferris wheel, interactive shooting galleries, specialty shops, and an enormous selection of golf equipment and apparel. It's an experience in itself, with multiple restaurants and attractions under one roof.
shortDescription: A 295,000 sq ft sporting goods destination with Ferris wheel, dual aquariums, and golf gear.

faqs.question: What makes SCHEELS special?
faqs.answer: SCHEELS Sparks is a 245,000 sq ft experience with a Ferris wheel, aquarium, shooting gallery, and one of the region's best golf equipment selections.

faqs.question: Does SCHEELS have golf equipment?
faqs.answer: Yes, they carry a comprehensive selection of golf clubs, bags, apparel, shoes, and accessories from all major brands.

faqs.question: Is SCHEELS free to visit?
faqs.answer: Entry is free. The Ferris wheel, shooting gallery, and other attractions are also complimentary.

meta.title: SCHEELS Sparks – Golf Gear & Attractions | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Visit SCHEELS in Sparks for 245,000 sq ft of sporting goods, golf equipment, a Ferris wheel, and aquarium. A must-see for golf groups.

testimonials.quote: SCHEELS was a fun surprise on our trip. Perfect for the non-golfers and honestly the golfers enjoyed it too. Reno / Sparks has so much more than just great courses.
testimonials.author: Ryan P.

testimonials.quote: Visited SCHEELS during our golf trip and it was a great addition to the itinerary. Nice change of pace from the courses. GTHS really knows how to round out a trip with the right activities.
